name: get_joke
description: This is the endpoint you need to call to get a joke.

type.description: Will make JokeAPI only serve jokes with this joke type. Leave empty to randomly select a type.
type.title: Type

format.description: The file format the joke should be served with
format.title: Format

contains.description: If specified, only jokes that contain this string will be served. Value needs to be percent-encoded.
contains.title: Contains

idRange.description: A single ID or range of IDs to serve jokes from
idRange.title: Idrange

blacklistFlags.description: A single or comma-separated list of blacklist flags
blacklistFlags.title: Blacklistflags

safe_mode.description: A value-less parameter, that, if present, will tell JokeAPI to try its hardest not to serve any offensive jokes. By default, every joke that has one or more flags set to true is considered unsafe, in addition to a few more hand-picked ones.
safe_mode.title: Safe Mode

name: info
description: This endpoint provides some information on JokeAPI

format.description: The file format the joke should be served with
format.title: Format

name: submit_joke
description: This endpoint is used to submit a joke to be reviewed and added to JokeAPI's official jokes.

name: categories
description: This endpoint returns a list / an array of all available joke categories

format.description: The file format the joke should be served with. More info: https://sv443.net/jokeapi/v2/#response-formats
format.title: Format

name: ping
description: This endpoint is intended for external uptime monitoring but you can also use it if you want to.

format.description: The file format the joke should be served with. More info: https://sv443.net/jokeapi/v2/#response-formats
format.title: Format

name: flags
description: This endpoint returns a list / an array of all available blacklist flags

format.description: The file format the joke should be served with. More info: https://sv443.net/jokeapi/v2/#response-formats
format.title: Format

name: formats
description: This endpoint returns a list / an array of all available response formats

format.description: The file format the joke should be served with. More info: https://sv443.net/jokeapi/v2/#response-formats
format.title: Format
